team.title: Our Team
team.text: Get ready we have something coming that is going to blow you away. Below is a sneak peek of what we offer. Check back often for our launch.

about.title: About Us
about.text: We are brining students to an immersive real-life world experience, gamifying assignment submission as well as blockchain games, you will be receiving mentorship and advice from team leads and creative freedom in your role. We are +35 members from 3 different countries. We Are Richedu!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.text: Follow our social networks for updates and more information.

cardsContent.title: Our Magical World Is Brewing
cardsContent.text: Get ready we have something coming that is going to blow you away. Below is a sneak peek of what we offer. Check back often for our launch.

cardsContent.title: We Are Growing
cardsContent.text: Currently, our worldwide family has reached +35 members and it's increasing.

cardsContent.title: Gamifying Assignment
cardsContent.text: We provide gamified assignments to interact students, as well as blockchain games. We won't let you get bored.

cardsContent.title: Mentorship Proccess
cardsContent.text: By joining us, you will be receiving mentorship and advice from team leads.
